bike.description: Jamis Road Dyad Supreme M40/M30 Monocoque Carbon Fiber Frame, FEA optimized Near Net SPV molding process, formed top and down tubes with SST tubing diameters, oversized tapered seat tube, 1 1/8-1 1/2" head tube with carbon bearing races, EVO386 carbon BB shell, ACE internal cable routing compatible for both Di2 wires or traditional cables, rider tuned twin seat stays with spoiler bridge, oversized asymmetrical chainstays with direct mount brakes, carbon drop outs with replaceable alloy FD mount and RD hanger.

components.description: Jamis WindShield II Aero carbon fork, FEA optimized Near Net SPV molding process, rear-facing front brake to reduced aerodynamic drag, 1.5" hollow formed crown, monocoque one-piece forming technology, carbon dropouts with stainless axle interfaces
Ritchey WCS Carbon Drop-In, sealed bearing with nylon upper Compression ring, 1 1/8-1 1/2"
Shimano Dura Ace C35 tubular wheelset, 16/20H, 35mm aero full carbon rims, Dura Ace front & rear hubset, bladed spokes
Vittoria Corsa Evo CX, 700 x 21c, tubular
Shimano Dura Ace RD-9000 rear and Dura Ace FD-9000 braze-on front with 34.9mm alloy clamp
Shimano Dura Ace ST- 9000 Dual Control STI, 22-Speed
FSA EVO PressFit 30 with ceramic bearings and Wheels MFG EVO adaptors
Shimano Dura Ace BR-9010 direct mount Super SLR dual pivot calipers and TRP TTV linear pull direct mount front with cartridge pads and Dura Ace ST-9000 STI carbon brake levers
Jamis gel suede tape with Jamis logo and "J" end plug
Ritchey Superlogic Carbon 1-bolt, 31.6 x 350mm with Jamis 7075-AL CNC aluminum 1-bolt seat post clamp
Selle San Marco Concor Racing Team with Microfil cover and Xsilite Rails
